homeSlider.title: Welcome to The Castle Auction
homeSlider.subTitle: Libya’s first auction house for confidently buying and selling rare and unique items.

category.heading: What We Offer
category.heading3: Explore an exceptional range of auction categories, tailored to suit every bidder's interests. From rare and exclusive pieces to unique items you won't find anywhere else, we bring together the best and most distinctive in one platform.

ongoing.heading: Participate in real-time bids and seize the opportunity to acquire exclusive pieces before the auction ends.

services.heading: Comprehensive Auction Display
services.heading1: A vast physical platform that allows hundreds of diverse items to be displayed in one place, including heavy equipment, vehicles, horses, livestock, real estate, home and office furniture, antiques, and agricultural products, for a comprehensive auction experience that meets all needs.
services.heading3: Enjoy a seamless remote live auction experience through our digital platform. We also provide professional appraisal services for sellers to determine the true and accurate value of their property before it is auctioned.
services.heading5: Dedicated support and guidance throughout the auction journey, from start to completion, to ensure a smooth and reliable experience.
services.heading7: To be the leading auction house in Libya and the region, founded on the values  of transparency, trust, and technological innovation. We also aim to provide a fair and accessible platform that enables everyone to display their items and participate in auctions with confidence and transparency.

about.heading: about Castle Auction
about.heading4: Castle Auction is redefining the auction experience with cutting-edge digital solutions and transparent bidding. Our platform connects buyers and sellers in real-time, making auctions faster, smarter, and more accessible. Whether you're looking for rare collectibles or high-value assets, Castle Auction ensures a seamless and secure transaction every step of the way. Experience the future of auctions—where innovation meets trust.

mobileSection.heading: enjoy our application
mobileSection.heading4: Experience seamless bidding on the go with the Castle Auction mobile app. Download now from the App Store or Google Play to stay connected, bid in real-time, and never miss an opportunity. Your next winning auction is just a tap away.

emailSubscribe.heading: STAY UPDATED WITH CASTLE-AUCTION
emailSubscribe.heading2: Subscribe with your email to get instant updates on new auctions, bidding events, and exclusive deals.
emailSubscribe.heading5: By subscribing, you agree to receive email updates from Castle-Auction about upcoming auctions and offers. Read our

auction1.title: Real-Time Bidding with Auto-Bid Feature
auction1.description: Experience seamless auctions with our real-time bidding system. Our intelligent auto-bid feature ensures you never miss a winning opportunity—set your max bid and let the system do the rest. Fast, fair, and fully transparent bidding designed to give you the edge.

auction2.title: Instant Alerts & Notifications
auction2.description: Stay in the loop with instant alerts on bids, counter-offers, auction endings, and more. Whether you're a buyer or seller, our real-time notification system keeps you informed every step of the way—never miss a deal again.

auction3.title: Buyer Protection & Dispute Resolution
auction3.description: Your trust matters. Our buyer protection program ensures secure transactions with transparent terms. If a dispute arises, our dedicated resolution team steps in to mediate and protect your interests—buy and sell with confidence.

promise.description: With years of experience powering seamless online auctions, we've built a reputation rooted in trust, transparency, and results. From first-time bidders to seasoned sellers, our platform is designed to deliver a smooth, secure, and reliable auction experience every time. We are committed to providing innovative tools, fair bidding practices, and round-the-clock support—because your success is our promise.
promise.missionDescription: Our mission is to provide unparalleled security solutions, ensuring peace of mind and assurance of protection to our clients, their customers, and the public. We deliver a higher standard of security services by deploying the latest innovations.
promise.visionDescription: Our vision is to cultivate thriving habitats where residents, businesses, and organizations grow confidently, knowing they are protected by technology that adapts naturally to their evolving needs while preserving the harmony between innovation and human wellbeing.
